abstract: As the Europeans eventually find the political will to tackle their deficits, can the United States do the same, an economist asks.
snippet: As the Europeans eventually find the political will to tackle their deficits, can the United States do the same, an economist asks.
lead_paragraph: Simon Johnson, the former chief economist at the International Monetary Fund, is the co-author of “13 Bankers.”

headline.main: Fresh Crises Loom in Europe and the U.S.
